Description: A base system configuration. This profile defines standard system values and is intended to be used as a base for other profiles.

Use this profile for a system that is compliant with baseline CDWA-Lite 1.1. Categories for the Description of Works of Art (CDWA-Lite) is a metadata standard used to describe a format for works of art and material culture.

A DACS and EAD compliant profile for Heritage Muse. Describing Archives: A Content Standard (DACS) is a standard for describing archives, personal papers, and manuscript collections, and can be applied to all material types. Encoded Archival Description (EAD) is a standard for encoding archival finding aids.

Use this profile for a system that is compliant with simple Darwin Core. Darwin Core is a standard which includes a glossary of terms intended to facilitate the sharing of information about biological diversity by providing identifiers, labels, and definitions, and is based on taxa.
A visual resources collection profile for art galleries, art collections, or any type of visual resources collection.

Use this profile for a system that is compliant with ISAD(G) and EAD. The International Standard Archival Description (General) (ISAD(G)) is a standard for creating descriptions of archival materials based on the principle of respect des fonds within a multi-level description.

Metadata Standard: SPECTRUM: The UK Museum Documentation Standard
Description: Use this profile for a system that is compliant with SPECTRUM: The UK Museum Documentation Standard. SPECTRUM is the UK collection management standard that is also an internationally recognized collections management standard, offering the primary specification for collections management activity in museums.
